channel.title: Servers/clients for linux!
channel.description: Hi, Im running Ubuntu and I was wondering if its possible to run a client on it? But theses are the problem =/ 1: Can't run .bat files 2: even if I was able to run them it wouldn't get to "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" cuz linux doesn't have "C:/Program Files". So can someone PLEASE Help me! And no I dont want to run it on a Virtual Machine THANKS!

item.title: Servers/clients for linux!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You need to make a bash file, Linux doesn’t use batch. Or you could use wine, a program used to run Java applications on Linux for your run file.

e.g

#!/bin/bash
java -Xmx512m -cp server

Read full topic

@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

use www.vpsland.com
you can choose your operating system use the windows XP Virtuozzo x64

item.title: Servers/clients for linux!
item.dc:creator: @shitbrixz shitbrixz
item.description:
@shitbrixz wrote:

Hi, Im running Ubuntu and I was wondering if its possible to run a client on it? But theses are the problem =/
1: Can’t run .bat files
2: even if I was able to run them it wouldn’t get to “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe” cuz linux doesn’t have “C:/Program Files”.
So can someone PLEASE Help me!
And no I dont want to run it on a Virtual Machine THANKS!

Read full topic
